author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.2.0-rc.2` -- Rhone and Arve -- released! üêº 
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.2.0-rc.2

Note -- This includes the Mainnet `BELLATRIX_FORK_EPOCH` and *tentative* `TERMINAL_TOTAL_DIFFICULTY`. The TTD value will be assessed and *potentially* modified on Thursday, monitor spec releases for any final updates.
